keyword: how many calories are in a large fry from mcdonalds
title: How Many Calories in a Large McDonald's Fry?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a large fry from McDonald's, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and serving tips for fast food tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in a Large McDonald's Fry?
assumptions: Standard McDonald's large fries (154 g serving), cooked in vegetable oil blend, no added salt or customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation time, and exact portion; values based on McDonald's official data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: A large McDonald's fry contains about 510 calories and 66 g of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison with packaging or apps.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a large fry from McDonald's?
What are the carbs in a large McDonald's fry?
faqs.a: About 66 g total carbs, including 6 g fiber.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a large McDonald's french fry?
faqs.a: 24 g total fat, with 3.5 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Does a large McDonald's fry have protein?
faqs.a: Yes, around 7 g of protein per serving.

faqs.q: How does sodium in McDonald's large fries compare?
faqs.a: 350 mg per large fry; varies slightly by location.
